basic.description: This course covers ordinary differential equations in the complex plane; special functions. Asymptotic methods: Laplaces method, steepest descent, stationary phase, WKB. Integral transforms: Fourier, Laplace, Hankel.
basic.subject: MAP
basic.title: Complex Variables, Asymptotic Expansions, and Integral Transforms

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MAP 4341 or MAP 5345; and MAA 4402 or MAA 5406.
